name: Tatascan - Connecticut - Toro
additionalNotes: Tatascan translates to "Head Boss", and Julio Eiroa is the man bearing that well-deserved title. Julio has introduced the Tatascan line in hopes of bringing an affordable, tasty, consistent offering to smokers everywhere. Manufactured by JRE Tobacco, every cigar is hand-rolled in Honduras at the Las Lomas factory. Mild-medium in strength, the Tatascan is perfect at absolutely any time of day, for smokers old and new alike.
